title: Fiscal, monetary combo to fight inflation

content.question: Which of the following mixes of fiscal and monetary policy would reduce inflation?

choices.label: Fiscal Policy Monetary Policy Decrease spending Increase interest on reserves
Fiscal Policy Monetary Policy Decrease taxes Increase interest on reserves
Fiscal Policy Monetary Policy Increase taxes Decrease interest on reserves
Fiscal Policy Monetary Policy Increase spending Increase interest on reserves
Fiscal Policy Monetary Policy Increase spending Decrease interest on reserves

content.answer: Fiscal Policy Monetary Policy Decrease spending Increase interest on reserves
